interfaceFramework

Class Clyde

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaceFramework.Ghost
      • interfaceFramework.Clyde

  • public class Clyde
extends Ghost
    The class is for the clyde ghost. The class incorporates all the attributes that this ghost should have

    • Method Detail

      • movePossible

        public void movePossible(Pacman pacman,
                int[][] board,
                Graphics g)
        Checking the possible movements that can be done by clyde if it is in scatter,chase or frightened move
        Parameters:
        pacman - the pacman object which is active in the game
        board - the board where the game is being played on by pacman and the ghosts
        g - the graphics which takes care of the drawing of different functions

      • withinProximity

        public boolean withinProximity(Pacman pacman)
        Checking if pacman is close enough to clyde
        Parameters:
        pacman - the pacman object which needs to be checked in relation to clyde
        Returns:
        true if pacman is within clyde's proximity, false otherwise

      • insideProximityScatter

        public void insideProximityScatter(int[][] board)
        Checking if pacman is close enough to clyde, when in scatter mode. checks for clyde for possible exists towards pacman
        Parameters:
        board - the board so that clyde can check the distance from pacman, when clyde is in scatter mode

      • outsideProximityChase

        public void outsideProximityChase(Pacman pacman,
                         int[][] board)
        Checking if pacman is close enough to clyde, when in scatter mode. checks for clyde for possible exists towards pacman
        Parameters:
        board - the board so that clyde can check the distance from pacman, when clyde is in chase mode
        board - the board which pacman and clyde are on
